name: 4x4 Car Climb Racing
description:
4x4 Car Climb Racing is one of new games of mountain climbing in racing games You love racing games but are bored of boring racing? Enjoy most challenging game of mountain climb race 4x4. Mountain climber in stages game has to climb hill in a car. Be best hill climber in hill racing 4x4 challenge mountain climbing games.
Features:
Awesome and different gameplay
Realistic, multiple and smooth control
Steering, tilt and buttons control
Multiple 4x4 vehicles option
Lot of adventurous challenges
Different mountain climbs tracks
